modules.name: Feedback Submission
modules.description: Module responsible for handling customer feedback submission

modules.name: Analytics Dashboard
modules.description: Module responsible for generating analytics dashboards

modules.name: Sentiment Analysis
modules.description: Module responsible for performing sentiment analysis on customer feedback

feedback_submission.description: Customer submits feedback through the frontend
steps: Data is sent to the backend API
API processes and validates the data
Validated data is stored in the database

sentiment_analysis.description: Sentiment analysis is performed on stored feedback data
steps: Data is retrieved from the database
Sentiment analysis is performed using machine learning algorithms
Results are stored in the database

analytics_dashboard.description: Analytics dashboard is generated using stored data
steps: Data is retrieved from the database
Data is processed and visualized using data visualization libraries
Dashboard is rendered in the frontend
